book.title: The Inner World of Dreams
book.author: Phyllis L. Pipitone
book.discription: Learn all about your dreams and what they can teach you about yourself and your world. The author takes the reader on a fascinating voyage into a mysterious world in which the dramas of the night can range from the completely outrageous to the lofty and sublime. The Inner World of Dreams is written in an easy-to-read style for the beginning and intermediate explorer of the world of dreams. It will give you a good start towards increased insight into your dreams.
